toFixed -> converts the number to string, rounds the string to specified number of decimals

Map -> key-value pair for replacement
const anyName = {
    key : pair,     (ensure data type)
    ....
    ...
    ..
}

reduce: function against an  accumulator and each  element in the  array from left to right.
        executes callback function for each elemnent in array and returns a single value

sort: sort elements of array
filter: creates a new array for all the test passed inside the specified function (iterates over all the elements)

typeof -> Used for validation of data type
throw new <exception_name> -> throwing exception anyName



JSON.stringify() -> converts a JS object or value to a JSON string
